name: french-data-generator
title: French Ssn & Iban Generator
description: Generate realistic French-specific fake data, including Social Security Numbers (SSNs) tied to the birth date and location, IBANs, and addresses. Perfect for developers and testers working with French data scenarios.
author: yoann-drx

commands.name: generate-french-data
commands.title: Generate French Ssn & Iban Data
commands.description: Generate realistic French fake data, including SSNs tied to birth date and location.

commands.name: menu-bar-french-data
commands.title: French Data Menu Bar
commands.subtitle: Quickly view and regenerate French fake data
commands.description: Display generated French-specific fake data (SSN, IBAN, etc.) in the menu bar with quick regeneration options.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
